item.title: Terraform for ricebucket.life
item.description: I’ll be using Terraform to automate my deployment of cloud services in different cloud providers. I’ll need to decide on the following three things: A centralized location to store Terraform code. I already decided as my code repositories should be in Github. A centralized storage for remote Terraform state files. A centralized secrets management. Hashicorp also offers free Cloud Terraform service. I don’t know how this works yet in terms of what is free and limitations, so I’m going to use the CLI to start.
